title: DACx578 Functional Block Diagram
summary: Functional architecture of the DACx578 showing I2C/control interfaces, per-channel data buffers and DAC registers, eight DAC channels (A-H), output buffers, and power-down control. AVDD and VREFIN feed the analog path while SCL/SDA and control pins drive digital control logic.

structured_data.mermaid:
flowchart LR
  SCL[SCL] --> ICL[Input Control Logic]
  SDA[SDA] --> ICL
  ADDR0[ADDR0] --> CL[Control Logic]
  ADDR1[ADDR1] --> CL
  LDAC[LDAC] --> CL
  RSTSEL[RSTSEL] --> CL
  CLR[CLR] --> CL
  ICL --> CL
  CL --> BC[Buffer Control]
  CL --> RC[Register Control]
  DBH[Data Buffer H] --> DRH[DAC Register H] --> DACH[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC H] --> OBH[Output Buffer H] --> VOUTH[VOUT_H]
  DBG[Data Buffer G] --> DRG[DAC Register G] --> DACG[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC G] --> OBG[Output Buffer G] --> VOUTG[VOUT_G]
  DBF[Data Buffer F] --> DRF[DAC Register F] --> DACF[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC F] --> OBF[Output Buffer F] --> VOUTF[VOUT_F]
  DBE[Data Buffer E] --> DRE[DAC Register E] --> DACE[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC E] --> OBE[Output Buffer E] --> VOUTE[VOUT_E]
  DBD[Data Buffer D] --> DRD[DAC Register D] --> DACD[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC D] --> OBD[Output Buffer D] --> VOUTD[VOUT_D]
  DBC[Data Buffer C] --> DRC[DAC Register C] --> DACC[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC C] --> OBC[Output Buffer C] --> VOUTC[VOUT_C]
  DBB[Data Buffer B] --> DRB[DAC Register B] --> DACB[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC B] --> OBB[Output Buffer B] --> VOUTB[VOUT_B]
  DBA[Data Buffer A] --> DRA[DAC Register A] --> DACA[8-/10-/12-Bit DAC A] --> OBA[Output Buffer A] --> VOUTA[VOUT_A]
  AVDD[AVDD] -.analog supply.-> DACH
  AVDD -.-> DACG
  AVDD -.-> DACF
  AVDD -.-> DACE
  AVDD -.-> DACD
  AVDD -.-> DACC
  AVDD -.-> DACB
  AVDD -.-> DACA
  VREFIN[VREFIN] -.reference.-> DACH
  VREFIN -.-> DACG
  VREFIN -.-> DACF
  VREFIN -.-> DACE
  VREFIN -.-> DACD
  VREFIN -.-> DACC
  VREFIN -.-> DACB
  VREFIN -.-> DACA
  PD[Power-Down Control Logic] --> OBA
  PD --> OBB
  PD --> OBC
  PD --> OBD
  PD --> OBE
  PD --> OBF
  PD --> OBG
  PD --> OBH
  GND[GND] --- PD
